doc.after: On 7 March 1861 during a meeting at the Adelphi Hotel in Sheffield a Match Fund Committee was established to run Yorkshire county matches The committee was made up from the management committee of the Bramall Lane ground and representatives from clubs willing to pay 1 to the fund 12 But the committee was unable to persuade other clubs that it was not seeking to promote Sheffield cricket and a lack of funds prevented some matches being played in 1862
